title: marudhAchala nAyAka
sahitya: marudAcala nAyAkA {mAl}marugA vElmurugA guhA shanmukhapriyanE  anupallavi  karuNAkarA tirutaNikAcalAsharaNAgata vatsalA satguNasIlA  caraNam  padamAgavE paraman manam kuLiramudalAna praNavap poruLtanda kumarAnidame undan pAdamE paNindEnAda yOgamE vENDinEn swAminAthanE
